ygData.subject: RE: Made 45 last night and love my new song :)
ygData.msgSnippet: You are NOT a tank, Shada=)Never have been, never will be. you cannot stand toe to toe with a Warrior or Paladin/Shadowknight and live. Its pointless unless
ygData.messageBody:
You are NOT a tank, Shada=)Never have been, never will be.
you cannot stand toe to toe with a Warrior or Paladin/Shadowknight and live.
Its pointless unless you use your speed and quickness as an asset.
Fear/chaining IS cheap. don't use it in a duel. But dont stand there and let
them pummel you to death while you try and sing, it aint gonna work,
darlin'.
Bards can Take some damage, but we were not meant to stand there and let
someone beat on us


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

well only way i can think of a melee class changing their tactics is maybe a
ranger kiting you with a bow. otherwise i suppose they don't. dunno why, i
just feel cheap running around bellowing or AE'ing or fear/chaining. wanna
see how i really stand up to them.

Shada


>
> From: Peck White <peck_white@...>
>
> Ummm, do the melee PCs you fight against modify their
> tactics, or do they fight you just like they would a
> mob? If the latter is true, then why should you
> change your tactics?
>
> Just wondering,
>
> Tomerrilin
> 21st song yesterday, 20th song today,
> Mistmoore can be cruel.
>
> --- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> > replying to myself. along these lines, i will say
> > against melee i have
> > never won, which included level 50 warrior, paladin,
> > and several rangers.
> > probably because i don't kite them and stand there
> > and get beat on like a
> > punching bag. and didn't mean to sound like i was
> > on an ego trip with those
> > wins i've had against casters, i just really enjoy
> > killing them =)
> >
> > Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> > Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
> > <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
> >
> >
> >
> > > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> > <Michael.Garramone@...>
> > >
> > > a jerk and stupid too i guess =) no way you'd be
> > stunning me
> > > while playing
> > > MR songs, which i always have going before
> > accepting the duel
> > > =) DoTs and
> > > DDs get through, but all or none spells, like root
> > or stun
> > > etc, almost never
> > > do. 50 v 50 with me having 120+ MR it's not gonna
> > happen ;)
> > > never tried a
> > > necro yet, too scared. but level 50 enchanter,
> > cleric, shaman, druid,
> > > wizard, magician i have all beat in duels.
> > >
> > > Shada
> >
